member.name: M:Caliburn.Spring.ProxyPostProcessor.PostProcessBeforeInitialization(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Apply this to the given new object instance before any object initialization callbacks.
member.returns: The object instance to use, either the original or a wrapped one.

remarks.p: The object will already be populated with property values. The returned object instance may be a wrapper around the original.

remarks.p: The object will already be populated with property values. The returned object instance may be a wrapper around the original.
